author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Monkey Punch and Yauso Otsuka autographs
body:
I'm not sure if anyone can make it to Japan right now, but for the lucky 
ones, check out www.animenewsservice.com for this:

"Lupin III and Siamese Cat creator, Monkey Punch and Yasuo Otsuka will 
appear on a tour through Shibuya, Nagoya and Sapporo at the end of this 
month. Titled the LUPIN THE THIRD EXHIBITION the event will be at Utsunomiya 
location Oct. 25th - Nov. 11. 10:00 - 20-30. Monkey is scheduled to sign on 
10/27 at 14:00 and Yasuo Otsuka will sign on 11/3. Admission is free of 
charge. Limited edition goods and a raffle will also take place.
"
